text: The student will investigate and understand that soil is important in ecosystems. Key ideas include
subject: Science
subs: soil, with its different components, is important to organisms; and
soil provides support and nutrients necessary for plant growth.

text: The student will investigate and understand that there is a water cycle and water is important to life on Earth. Key ideas include
subject: Science
subs: there are many reservoirs of water on Earth;
the energy from the sun drives the water cycle; and
the water cycle involves specific processes.
